description: Minimal size of the center of G where G is a finite group of order n.
comments: a(n) = n if and only if n belongs to sequence A051532 - Avi Peretz (njk(AT)netvision.net.il), Feb 27 2001a(n) = 1 if and only if n occurs in A060702. - _Eric M. Schmidt_, Aug 27 2012
links: Eric M. Schmidt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
formula: For prime p and m >= 3, a(p^m) = p. - _Eric M. Schmidt_, Aug 27 2012
example: a(6) = 1 because the symmetric group S_3 has trivial center.
prog: (GAP) A059806 := function(n) local min, fact, i; if (n mod 6 = 0) then return 1; fi; if (IsPrimePowerInt(n)) then fact := Factors(n); if (Length(fact) <> 2) then return fact[1]; fi; fi; min := n; for i in [1..NumberSmallGroups(n)] do min := Minimum(min, Size(Center(SmallGroup(n, i)))); if (min = 1) then break; fi; od; return min; end; # _Eric M. Schmidt_, Aug 27 2012
author: Noam Katz (noamkj(AT)hotmail.com), Feb 24 2001
extensions: More terms from _Eric M. Schmidt_, Aug 27 2012
